Their tailored solutions significantly improved our efficiency, and their ongoing support is exceptional. Highly recommend! Explore Our IT Services Software Development For more than 11 years we have been developing solutions both under the order of specific customers and off-label - so that in the future interested customers can use products under their own brand. Our technology stack includes, but is not limited to, the following up-to-date IT tools: GoLang, NodeJs, AngularJs, TypeScript, Gulp, MongoDb, Redis, RabbitMQ, MySQL, Suricata, GreyLog, PHP, Kotlin multiplatform. Process Automation We are constantly improving our internal processes and automating them. We are happy to share our experience with our partners, helping them optimize their business processes. IT Consulting Having an impressive IT expertise, we share our experience and knowledge with partners to evaluate their business hypotheses as quickly as possible, in order to optimize investments in new business areas and form a scalable architecture for future IT solutions. IT Security Services Conducting an annual audit of our solutions for compliance with the PCI DSS standard, we constantly monitor the development of intrusion detection and prevention systems, actively apply them and adapt them to our tasks and those of our clients, so that reliable and stable IT solutions become a reliable basis for business development. Business and market analytics We regularly update the analytics we collect on changes and developments in the fintech market, e-commerce business models, consumer consumption patterns (mainly in the South and Southeast Asian market). Based on this data, we and our partners plan the development of our products. Project Management We professionally manage our development projects using agile methodologies to quickly respond to changing market requirements or technology constraints that are identified during development. We are also ready to take control of our clients' product development processes if they plan to focus on strategic development. System Integration The process of launching a new product or major updates to a working solution is always an important and responsible task. Therefore, our integration team is always ready to help and take care of the issues of correct configuration, data migration, testing, etc. Support Service We believe that customer-oriented technical support turns good IT products into favorite ones. Therefore, we invest a lot of energy and effort so that both our products and the products of our customers become loved by all users. A digital platform designed for seamless connection of electric vehicle charging stations. The goal is to make EV charging as accessible, convenient, and efficient as possible for users. What does the platform provide? The platform unites charging stations from different operators in one place, allowing you to easily find and access any available charging point, regardless of its owner or location. Why is this important? We understand the importance of accessible charging stations for electric vehicle owners. Therefore, the process of expanding the network is actively underway so that customers can charge their cars without unnecessary effort and long searches. What now? Not only has a convenient platform been created for connecting charging stations, but the user experience has also been improved by integrating a mobile application. The mobile application allows users to manage the charging process, make payments, and easily integrate with other services.
